Instruction: Preheat your oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit (190 degrees Celsius). Prep your cookie sheets by greasing them with butter or non-stick cooking spray.

Combine butter, oil, granulated sugar, and powdered sugar in a large bowl; mix until smooth. Add eggs one at a time, followed by vanilla. In a separate bowl, mix flour, baking soda, and cream of tartar; then blend into the sugar mixture. Drop teaspoons of dough onto greased cookie sheets.
Bake in preheated oven for 8 to 10 minutes, or until bottoms are lightly browned. Remove from baking sheets and cool on wire racks.
